targets.query: SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE "host" = 'Redemption' AND "path" = '/mnt/user0' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("uptime") FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_percent") FROM "docker_container_cpu" WHERE "host" = 'Redemption' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "container_image" fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_percent") FROM "docker_container_cpu" WHERE "host" = 'Redemption' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "container_image" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("rx_bytes"),1s)/8 as "rx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE "host" = 'Redemption' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tx_bytes"),1s)/8 as "tx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE "host" = 'Redemption' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m),* fill(null)
